Sasuke throws some lightning infused [[kunai]] at his opponent. When they're about to connect, Sasuke switches place with one of them, and delivers a [[Blaze Release: Kagutsuchi|Kagutsuchi]] enhanced [[Chidori]].
[[tr:Amenotejikara: Chidori]]
